00014 // .NAME vtkMrmlScenesNode - MRML node to represent a saved scene
00015 // .SECTION Description
00016 // Scenes contain a bunch of MRML nodes that describe a specific view saved
00017 // by the user. The Scenes node itself only contains a scene language (for
00018 // future use) and the name of the scene.
00019
